text:
Hi all!
Can anyone help me to find a documentation (if any) for  form customisation? It was possible to customise
onFormSubmit event in the form embed code : <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/advanced_form_options>

however  I cannot find how to customise new pop up forms:
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/forms/create-pop-up-forms#form>
I'm having a weird problem with the associations v4 api....v3 returns the info I want, while v4 is returning a empty array, even for "Read All". Has anyone ran into this before?

Hello <#C2YHAHB6K|api>

How can I add contact in the HubSpot list using HubSpot api ?
was this created with the transactional email api, i cant seem to find the correct parameters to create a non logged email when i dont have a threadid

hi <@U07HBAD6K16>, I see you and <@U07F0TN8CUT> have both asked after this. Do you both work at <http://cm.com|cm.com>?

Anyway, the good news is that the reason that sending messages/initializing conversations endpoints are not available is that we've been building a sister API that largely covers what you are asking after. The Custom Channels API is now in private beta, and you'll be able to read docs about it and try it when we go to public beta soon.
Hi Pablo, this was just a normal marketing email. My test proofs it works, but to really role this out at scale would likely require a bit more testing.

Hey <@U03DU06MZ7Y>

Check out my <https://gist.github.com/justingivens/d705f1b9d0f8de0dc9303b17ebd68e8d|gist here>. Youâ€™ll see how you can capture the onCallToActionFormSubmitted for Popup CTAs.

You can message around with the event data and check for `event.data.name === 'onCallToActionViewed'`

Hello <@U04B32JHTUZ> Yes we both work at <http://cm.com|cm.com>
Ok thats great!
Thank you very much!

If possible can you please share the estimated time duration from now to the release of the Custom Channels API in public beta

Also can you please tell me the exact  beta update name because i'am not able to find with Custom Channels API name in product updates

Hello <#C2YHAHB6K|api>
Can I use Search API to filter companies from a Salesforce field or a custom field?

We are into MarTech business. Our clients use HubSpot. As a part of the service we need to ingest the data like contacts and their activity from the HubSpot to our solution <https://drivemetadata.com/|DriveMetadata(DMD)> using `webhook`.

We used to allocate client id and workspace id to our each and every client. We want client id and workspace id in the request from webhook to <https://drivemetadata.com/|DriveMetadata(DMD)>.

Please help how we can achieve with HubSpot app?
